definition: picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program

sentences.english: Harrison Ford stars in the remake of "Sabrina".
sentences.chinese: 哈里森福特在“新龍鳳配”這部電影中擔綱演出。

sentences.english: Overall plan for the park RTKL senior experts from the United States will see.
sentences.chinese: 園區總體規劃由美國RTKL資深專家擔綱。

sentences.english: Both movies star young actors who had been relatively unknown in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 兩部影片均由在好萊塢籍籍無名的年輕演員擔綱主演。

sentences.english: Then she landed her first leading role in A Walk to Remember.
sentences.chinese: 隨後她在《初戀的回憶》中第一次擔綱女主演。
